name: The International conference on Advances in Crop Improvement and Agronomy
content: The International conference on Advances in Crop Improvement and Agronomy (ACIA2019) will be held from March 23 to 25, 2019 in Xi’an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Crop Improvement and Agronomy. The aim of ACIA 2019 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
